statements: DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND budget > 5000;
DELETE FROM ROI_metrics WHERE engagement_metrics < 0.5 AND conversion_rate > 0.8;
DELETE FROM Marketing_campaigns WHERE budget < 1000 AND (start_date < '2021-01-01' OR end_date > '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_name = 'Marketing Campaign X';
DELETE FROM performance_logs WHERE message_id = 123 AND metric_id = 456;
DELETE FROM ad_performance WHERE ad_id = 500 AND campaign_id = 201;
DELETE FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id = 2002 AND clicks > 1000;
